.. filtered analysis of transcripts

Gene set analysis
==========================================================

Here we identify the gene sets (produced with hts-integrate) that are significantly with significant p-values (FDR threshold = 0.1).

Xenopus species without IEA
----------------------------------


Biologcal process
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gene-set  | genes   | transcripts  | build   | dir.    | aspect  | p-value  | FDR      | top-terms                                       |
+===========+=========+==============+=========+=========+=========+==========+==========+=================================================+
| gs-11     | 7       | 142          | dn      | neg     | bp      | 0.0      | 0.0      | free ubiquitin chain polymerization             |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-4      | 18      | 105          | ref     | neg     | bp      | 0.0      | 0.0      | positive regulation of DNA repair               |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+

Gene set figures
""""""""""""""""""""

   :width: 30%
.. image:: ./figures/x-noiea-bp-gs-4.png
   :width: 30%


Molecular function
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^


+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gene-set  | genes   | transcripts  | build   | dir.    | aspect  | p-value  | FDR      | top-terms                                       |
+===========+=========+==============+=========+=========+=========+==========+==========+=================================================+
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-109    | 17      | 185          | dn      | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | microtubule binding                             |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-151    | 6       | 43           | dn      | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | oligosaccharyl transferase activity             |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-95     | 2       | 21           | gg      | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | estrogen receptor binding                       |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-66     | 6       | 37           | gg      | pos     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | L-alanine:2-oxoglutarate aminotransferase ...   |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-139    | 1       | 24           | ref     | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | ubiquitin-protein transferase activity          |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-37     | 85      | 424          | ref     | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | transcription regulatory region DNA binding     |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-102    | 1       | 18           | ref     | pos     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | sequence-specific DNA binding                   |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-32     | 1       | 19           | ref     | pos     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | sequence-specific DNA binding                   |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+

Xenopus species with IEA
----------------------------------


Biologcal process
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gene-set  | genes   | transcripts  | build   | dir.    | aspect  | p-value  | FDR      | top-terms                                       |
+===========+=========+==============+=========+=========+=========+==========+==========+=================================================+
| gs-45     | 68      | 473          | dn      | pos     | bp      | 0.0      | 0.0      | oxidation-reduction process                     |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-34     | 26      | 323          | ref     | neg     | bp      | 0.0      | 0.0      | proteolysis                                     |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-53     | 101     | 432          | ref     | pos     | bp      | 0.0      | 0.0      | metabolic process                               |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+

Molecular function
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gene-set  | genes   | transcripts  | build   | dir.    | aspect  | p-value  | FDR      | top-terms                                       |
+===========+=========+==============+=========+=========+=========+==========+==========+=================================================+
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-87     | 4       | 12           | gg      | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | transferase activity                            |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-136    | 6       | 124          | ref     | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | nucleotide binding                              |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-146    | 63      | 129          | ref     | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | RNA binding                                     |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-29     | 3       | 121          | ref     | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | GTP binding                                     |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-7      | 10      | 229          | ref     | neg     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | protein binding                                 |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-3      | 2       | 32           | ref     | pos     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | DNA binding                                     |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
| gs-5      | 14      | 87           | ref     | pos     | mf      | 0.0      | 0.0      | transporter activity                            |
+-----------+---------+--------------+---------+---------+---------+----------+----------+-------------------------------------------------+
